name: Pac Land Adventures
description:
Game Jam Info: Made for Weekly Game Jam 50 : "Remake a Classic"

Controls:

   Arrow keys/ WASD keys to move.

   Spacebar to interact.

   Enter to pause.

Credits:

Music/SFX: Gerry Brazell (https://gerry9000000.itch.io)

Code/Art: Bhagat Nagi

... and debugging help from Knives (https://arashizakku.itch.io)

Note: The jam version of the game has some very annoying bugs. A post-jam version will be 

posted some time in the future with lesser bug.
